body_html: Ok, so I've surrendered and undone my changes to make at::optional<int32_t> the device index type. The CUDA device compiler is not able to compile it, and I've wasted way too much time trying to move certain methods into the .cpp file and fighting these issues on Windows, where they are especially prevalent. -1 is once more default device.
body_text: Ok, so I've surrendered and undone my changes to make at::optional<int32_t> the device index type. The CUDA device compiler is not able to compile it, and I've wasted way too much time trying to move certain methods into the .cpp file and fighting these issues on Windows, where they are especially prevalent. -1 is once more default device.
body: Ok, so I've surrendered and undone my changes to make `at::optional<int32_t>` the device index type. The CUDA device compiler is not able to compile it, and I've wasted way too much time trying to move certain methods into the `.cpp` file and fighting these issues on Windows, where they are especially prevalent. -1 is once more default device.
